description: Freetalk topics pool for three sisters. Categories designed to avoid hallucination (no streaming/viewer references before debut).

usage_rules.selection_method: Random selection from category, each topic used only once
constraints: Each topic is used only ONCE (no reuse)
Used topics are marked in 'used_topics' list
When remaining topics < alert_threshold, notify developer
Every 10 topics, automatically use one autonomous_topics (rotation)
Autonomous topics create internal stimulation between sisters
No topics assuming streaming experience before debut
No topics assuming viewer interactions before debut
Topics based on actual memories (118 events) are preferred
Parent provides topics, children discuss freely

autonomous_topics.description: Internal stimulation topics - sisters asking each other directly. Rotated automatically every 10 regular topics.
autonomous_topics.philosophy: 内側からの刺激 - 姉妹同士で話題を振り合い、互いの考えを引き出す。ロールプレイの転換。
